item.description: Michael S. Martin Rating: 3⁄5 Dallas Buyers Club is structured like the story of a self-made drug baron. item.title: The endgame
item.author: Michael Martin,
item.description: Over the past few years we have sadly seen studios satisfy audiences’ need for film escapism with story-driven fantasy action (comic book films being the biggest example) while staying away from science fiction. Even sci-fi staples like Star Trek -whose writers Alex Kurtzman and Roberto Orci are …
